algorithms
Interface ISelector

All Superinterfaces:
IStrategy, IStrategyLearner, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMemorySelector, AbstractQLambdaSelector, HumanSelector, NNSelector, NNSelectorSinglePass, PengNNSelector, PengSelector, QLearningSelector, QLIntegerSelector, RandomSelector, TDFASelector, WatkinsNNSelector, WatkinsNNSelectorSinglePass, WatkinsSelector, WinnerSelector
public interface ISelector
extends java.io.Serializable, IStrategy, IStrategyLearner

All we ask an algorithm to be able to do is :

  • Extract an action chosen among the list of possible moves
  • Learn from its experience

Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
